content.raw: I'd be fine with declining this but I'm not fine with fixing that so called bug. Our group gets a great amount of use from this bug. We use this to start a bunch of measurements in the evenings to run over nigh before heading home. Waiting is not a option in that case at it can be upward of 20000 shots total and compilation usually ends at 2 or 3am. As the shots are from different script just doing it all in one engage is not a option either.
